event.title: was formed out of Douglas County on February 24, 1909

data.event: The county was formed out of Douglas County on February 24, 1909 and is named for U.S. President Ulysses S. Grant.
One government official described the area in 1879 as, "â€¦a desolation where even the most hopeful can find nothing in its future prospects to cheer."
The first large-scale irrigation attempts began in 1898, but it would be years before real success.
